title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Enhancement: Corpus-Based Mandarin Request Expression Education: For Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Chinese grammar/vocabulary knowledge and basic science subject terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can select and apply appropriate Chinese request strategies in various social contexts (teacher-student, peer-to-peer) with at least 80% accuracy
Learners can apply at least five polite expressions (internal modification techniques) derived from corpus analysis to real-life conversation scenarios
Students can categorize and produce/submit 10 essential collaborative request expressions for science projects by context in a digital portfolio
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
